short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a Help button, Pronunciation Analysis feature, and audio recording in the teacher's media system to meet the AFAPS requirements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customized to meet the requirements of the Armed Forces Academies Preparatory School, this extension introduces essential functionalities to the FirstClass English learning platform: a Student Help Button for bilingual instructional content, precise Pronunciation Analysis utilizing SpeechSuper API, and the capability to store audio recordings in the teacher's media system for reviews.
